name: gotsportteamerscheduler
description: An application that converts raw GotSport registration data in CSV format and provides both teaming and scheduling frameworks, intended to support youth sports organizations.

scripts.lint: node --check src/teamGeneration.js && node --check src/practiceScheduling.js && node --check src/practiceMetrics.js && node --check src/practiceSlotExpansion.js && node --check src/gameScheduling.js && node --check src/gameMetrics.js && node --check src/outputGeneration.js && node --check src/evaluationPipeline.js && node --check src/rosterSizing.js && node --check tests/teamGeneration.test.js && node --check tests/practiceScheduling.test.js && node --check tests/practiceMetrics.test.js && node --check tests/practiceSlotExpansion.test.js && node --check tests/gameScheduling.test.js && node --check tests/gameMetrics.test.js && node --check tests/outputGeneration.test.js && node --check tests/evaluationPipeline.test.js && node --check tests/rosterSizing.test.js && node --check scripts/build.js
